A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: My biggest problem is Rian Johnson’s selfish ambition: he wanted to take the story in a different direction to justify his supposed creativity. Why would you try to do something different and kill off Luke in a pathetic state? Disney bought the rights to Star Wars - we can take the story in a different direction for the next 100 years. Why did you have to ruin the original story and characters with your selfish need to be different? BTW\, Leia flying through space was the stupidest thing I’ve ever seen in a movie. Just a big black eye on an otherwise decent film.
